author: Wei, HJ; Jiang, RC; Zhang, JN
adress: Tianjin Med Univ, Dept Neurosurg, Gen Hosp, Tianjin, Peoples R China
title: Atorvastatin Protects Against Cerebral Aneurysmal Degenerative Pathology by Promoting Endothelial Progenitor Cells (EPC) Mobilization and Attenuating Vascular Deterioration in a Rat Model
